Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) continues to show great promise for the generation of electricity for an increasing range of applications.
Titulo: Materials for lower temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The present SOFC technology is based on an all-ceramic design, which eliminates the corrosion problems associated with fuel cells containing liquid electrolytes.
Titulo: Materials for lower temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To obtain good electrochemical performance with the currently used materials, this all-ceramic fuel cell operates at 1000 degreesC. Despite a significant amount of research and several successful demonstrations at the 100 kW level, commercialisation of the technology is not as rapid as anticipated.
Titulo: Materials for lower temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This is, in part, due to the high operating temperatures required, necessitating the use of expensive materials.
Titulo: Materials for lower temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As a result of these problems, there has been an effort over the past few years to lower the SOFC operating temperature.
Titulo: Materials for lower temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This paper will address the issues concerning the development of new materials that can operate at lower temperatures.
Titulo: Materials for lower temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Many of these issues have been or are being addressed in the research performed at Argonne National Laboratory, and some recent results will be discussed.
Titulo: Materials for lower temperature solid oxide fuel cells
